universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Interface Slideable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WidgetGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditLayout, FrameLayoutWidget, GridViewWidget, HorizontalScrollViewWidget, InputLayout, LinearLayoutWidget, ListViewWidget, RecyclerViewWidget, RelativeLayoutWidget, ScrollViewWidget, SearchView, SpinnerLayout, ViewPagerWidget, WebViewWidget

    public interface Slideable
    Interface for slideable views. Specifies API for transitioning view along its X and Y axis. Position of the slideable view is changed by updating its left or top position.

    The slideable view can be moved along its X axis by setFractionX(float) and along its Y axis by setFractionY(float). Both of these methods will accept fraction values from the range [-1, 1] where -1 means to move the view by -100 % along the requested axis "backward" and 1 means to move the view by 100 % along the requested axis "forward".

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int OUT_OF_SCREEN
      Position used to situate a view out of the screen in case such a view does not have its size initialized yet, so it is unable to compute fraction for X or Y coordinate.
      static boolean SLIDEABLE
      Flag indicating whether the widgets can use API allowing to modify x and y position of a view introduced in HONEYCOMB.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getFractionX()
      Returns the current fraction for the X axis of this view.
      float getFractionY()
      Returns the current fraction for the Y axis of this view.
      void setFractionX(float fraction)
      Sets the fraction for X axis of this view.
      void setFractionY(float fraction)
      Sets the fraction for Y axis of this view.

    • Field Detail

      • OUT_OF_SCREEN

        static final int OUT_OF_SCREEN
        Position used to situate a view out of the screen in case such a view does not have its size initialized yet, so it is unable to compute fraction for X or Y coordinate.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SLIDEABLE

        static final boolean SLIDEABLE
        Flag indicating whether the widgets can use API allowing to modify x and y position of a view introduced in HONEYCOMB.

    • Method Detail

      • setFractionX

        void setFractionX(float fraction)
        Sets the fraction for X axis of this view. This fraction determines how this view should be moved along its X axis depends on its current width.

        Setting this value for example to 1 will move this view by 100 % of its width to the right.

        Note, that setting this value out of the proper range can resolve into unpredictable results.

        Parameters:
        fraction - The desired fraction from the range [-1, 1].

      • getFractionX

        float getFractionX()
        Returns the current fraction for the X axis of this view.
        Returns:
        Fraction for X axis.

      • setFractionY

        void setFractionY(float fraction)
        Sets the fraction for Y axis of this view. This fraction determines how this view should be moved along its Y axis depends on its current height.

        Setting this value for example to -1 will move this view by 100 % of its height to the top.

        Note, that setting this value out of the proper range can resolve into unpredictable results.

        Parameters:
        fraction - The desired fraction from the range [-1, 1].

      • getFractionY

        float getFractionY()
        Returns the current fraction for the Y axis of this view.
        Returns:
        Fraction for Y axis.
